pageProps.title: The Emergence Network
pageProps.tagline: What if the way we respond to the crisis is part of the crisis?

body.raw: We are a constellation of humans and nonhumans working together trans-locally to curate projects, rituals, conversations and events that nurture senses of the otherwise via practices that trouble the traditional boundaries of agency and possibility.
